summary: Highly skilled Full-Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in React, Node.js, Python, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of leading teams and delivering high-impact projects. Passionate about clean code, user experience, and continuous learning.

experience.description: Leading development of enterprise SaaS platform serving 10,000+ users.
achievements: Architected and implemented microservices architecture, improving system scalability by 300%
Led team of 5 developers in agile environment, delivering features 40% faster
Reduced application load time by 60% through performance optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from hours to minutes
Built MVP from scratch, securing $2M in Series A funding
Developed RESTful APIs handling 1M+ daily requests
Developed responsive web applications for 20+ clients
Collaborated with design team to improve UI/UX
Maintained legacy codebases and fixed critical bugs

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
